snippet: The Carlyle Group swung to a second-quarter loss of $57 million, as it struggled to show growth in its core private equity investments.
abstract: The Carlyle Group swung to a second-quarter loss of $57 million, as it struggled to show growth in its core private equity investments.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Carlyle Swings to a Loss in 2nd Quarter
